post.Title: Java desktop links of the week, June 2
post.Content:
A quiet week this one - and apologies for the day delay in posting this, public holidays (as yesterday was) are distracting!

JavaFX

  • Jeramy Singleton has blogged about spell checking in JavaFX applications. Nicely done! :-)
  • Nicolai Parlog has announced that LibFX 0.3.0 has been released. This release contains a lot of API around collection transformations.
  • Bennet Schulz has blogged about testing JavaFX applications with TestFX.
  • 'Rogach' has ported Swing's GroupLayout to JavaFX: introducing GroupLayoutPane.

That's all folks - see you next week.
